titleStmt.title: To the right honorable the Lords spirituall and temporall in this present Parliament assembled the humble petition of Erasmus Record and Millicent Vaughan widow, the administratrix of the goods, chattels and debts of Walter Vaughan deceased.
titleStmt.author: Record, Erasmus.

notesStmt.note: Petition for payment of debts owed the petitioners.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
